name: Massattack: Annihilation
description:
Our fears have been realized. An armada of an unknown origin is at our doorstep, we don't know if they are friendly or hostile, but we cannot take any chances!

Annihilate everything!

Use cursor keys to move your ship around (or WASD), use+hold space (or F) to shoot. Please just refresh the page when you die :'(

This is a game for Autumn 2021 Lisp Game Jam. This game is written in Clojurescript and uses the canvas API. Howler.js (https://howlerjs.com/) is used for audio.

Credits:

  • Laser sound: dklon, https://opengameart.org/content/laser-fire
  • Explosions: Unnamed (Viktor.Hahn@web.de), https://opengameart.org/content/9-explosion-sounds
  • Background Music: The Looming Battle by Zefz, https://opengameart.org/content/orchestral-battle-music

To build and run this game locally, just run `npm install && npm run watch` and go to `localhost:8080`.
